hesml.configurators.icmodels

Class CondProbRefinedLeavesSubsumers

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.configurators.icmodels.AbstractICmodel
      • hesml.configurators.icmodels.AbstractCondProbICmodel
        • hesml.configurators.icmodels.CondProbRefinedLeavesSubsumers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITaxonomyInfoConfigurator

    class CondProbRefinedLeavesSubsumers
extends AbstractCondProbICmodel
    This class implements an unpublished IC model called CondProbRefLeavesSubsumers that belongs to the family introduced in the paper below. Lastra-Díaz, J. J. and García-Serrano, A. (2016). A refinement of the well-founded Information Content models with a very detailed experimental survey on WordNet. Tech. Rep. TR-2016-01 Department of Computer Languages and Systems. NLP and IR Research Group. Universidad Nacional de Educación a Distancia (UNED). http://e-spacio.uned.es/fez/view/bibliuned:DptoLSI-ETSI-Informes-Jlastra-refinement In addition, the commercial use of this IC model is partially protected by the following US patent application: Lastra Díaz, J. J. and García Serrano, A. (2016). System and method for the indexing and retrieval of semantically annotated data using an ontology-based information retrieval model. United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) Application, US2016/0179945 A1.
    Author:
    j.lastra

      • getSanchez2011Factor

        private double getSanchez2011Factor(IVertex vertex)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        This function computes the Leaves/Subsumers ratio defined by the Sánchez et al.(2011) IC model cited below. Sánchez, D., Batet, M., and Isern, D. (2011). Ontology-based information content computation. Knowledge-Based Systems, 24(2), 297–303.
        Parameters:
        vertex - Base vector for the computation of the Sánchez-Batet-Isern factor
        Returns:
        Sánchez-Batet-Isern factor for the input vertex
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Unexpected error

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This function returns a String representing IC model type of the current object.

        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representing the IC model type of the current instance
